sub_title: Strategic international communications / service design and innovation / project management / storytelling / journalism
summary:
Welcome! 

üí´ I can help you to make a positive impact and change minds through communications and human-centered design.

üë©‚Äçüíª I'm experienced in strategic communications and in coordinating complex projects in fast-paced international contexts.

üí°As an innovative thinker and results-oriented doer, I'll ensure strategic goals are met and processes developed.

üåè I‚Äôm skilled in producing engaging content for multiple channels and audiences i.e. on public health, humanitarian aid, human rights, climate change, sustainable development, gender and migration.

‚úçüèº Journalistic writing is my passion. I contribute to media outlets and film festivals, and understand how the media functions.

‚ù§Ô∏è I‚Äôm an empathetic facilitator and problem-solver who takes into account ethical issues and ensures everyone's voice is heard. 

ü§© Student of Service Innovation & Design (MBA). Fascinated by human-centered design, customer experience, co-creation, strategic foresight and behavioural insights.

üëÇüèΩHappy to connect and learn from you!
